course_title: Scientific Communication for Clinical and Translational Science
course_description: This course will provide training for translational scientists on how to communicate science internally (to other scientists), and externally (to the public and communities served).
sections: Class Nbr: 6291, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Th 2-3p, Instructor: J. Felger, Status: Open
